backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing stories, user profiles, and AppUser state with access control, profile storage, and user creation/query functions.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented premium subscription flow requirements and related files/components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of multiple frontend files describing their roles in routing, UI, user state, and PWA behavior.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH color variables for light/dark themes and applying global background/foreground rules.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting PWA metadata, icons, theme colors, and mounting the root React app.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest specifying app metadata, icons, categories, and standalone display settings.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker providing offline caching with network-first navigation and cache-first asset strategies.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app configuring router, splash and onboarding flows, layout, and service worker registration.
frontend/src/components/AdPlaceholder.ts: Shows a placeholder ad unless the user is premium, with banner or inline sizing.
frontend/src/components/AppDrawer.tsx: Side drawer showing profile info and navigation links, adjusting for premium users.
frontend/src/components/AppHeader.tsx: Top header with menu button, app icon, and user avatar fetched from profile.
frontend/src/components/BottomNav.tsx: Bottom navigation bar with translated tab labels and active‑route highlighting.
frontend/src/components/CategoryScroller: Horizontally scrollable category list filtered by mode and localized by language.
frontend/src/components/ContinueReadingC: Displays the user’s most recent story with progress and navigation to continue reading.
frontend/src/components/DailyStoryNotifi: Shows a dismissible banner for daily story updates, hidden for 24 hours after dismissal.
frontend/src/components/InstallPromptBan: Prompts users to install the PWA with install and dismiss actions.
frontend/src/components/InterstitialAdMo: Modal showing an interstitial ad with a countdown before allowing close.
frontend/src/components/LanguageSelector: Dropdown allowing selection of app language from supported options.
frontend/src/components/LegalSupportPage: Layout wrapper for legal/support pages with back navigation and footer.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Login/logout button handling Internet Identity auth and clearing queries on logout.
frontend/src/components/ModeToggle.tsx: Toggle for switching between adults and kids reading modes.
frontend/src/components/onboarding/Onboa: Manages the multi-step onboarding process for selecting language, mode, and theme, with transitions and skip logic.
frontend/src/components/onboarding/StepT: Handles directional slide and fade animations for onboarding step transitions with reduced-motion support.
Reading settings popover for font size, background theme, and auto‑scroll options.
frontend/src/components/ReminderBanner.t: Displays a reminder banner when allowed, dismissible and tracked in storage.
frontend/src/components/ShareSheetPlaceh: Provides a share button that triggers story sharing, records engagement, and shows a bonus toast if unlocked.
frontend/src/components/SplashScreen.tsx: Displays the app splash screen with logo, taglines, loading indicator, and fallback icon handling.
frontend/src/components/StoryCard.tsx: Renders a story preview card with cover, title, metadata, premium indicators, and navigation on click.
Shows a banner when a story lacks translation and triggers a placeholder translation when clicked.
frontend/src/components/UserAvatar.tsx: Displays a user avatar with optional image, fallback icon, size presets, and loading overlay.
Provides user preference state (language, mode, font, etc.), initializes from user data or browser language, and persists updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on authentication identity, reinitializing and invalidating queries on identity change.
frontend/src/hooks/useAppUser.ts: Manages authenticated or guest user state, syncing with backend when logged in and localStorage otherwise.
frontend/src/hooks/useFavorites.ts: Handles favorite story management for authenticated users via backend and guests via localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, loading identities, handling login flow, and exposing auth state.
frontend/src/hooks/useOfflineDownloads.t: Stores downloaded stories offline using localStorage, allowing saving, removing, and retrieving stories.
frontend/src/hooks/usePrefersReducedMoti: Detects and tracks the user's prefers‑reduced‑motion system setting.
frontend/src/hooks/usePwaInstallPrompt.t: Captures the PWA install prompt event, manages dismissal timing, and exposes install trigger functions.
frontend/src/hooks/useReadingHistory.ts: Tracks reading history for users, using backend for authenticated users and localStorage for guests.
frontend/src/hooks/useStories.ts: Fetches stories, a single story, or a daily featured story from the backend with filtering options.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: React hook managing user or guest profiles with fetch, transform, and save logic including image handling.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styles defining themes, fonts, safe-area handling, and animation keyframes.
frontend/src/lib/covers.ts: Returns story cover image URLs based on category and kid-friendly mode.
frontend/src/lib/engagement.ts: Handles engagement tracking such as streaks, badges, shares, and localStorage persistence.
frontend/src/lib/fonts.ts: Maps UI language codes to corresponding font CSS classes.
frontend/src/lib/i18n.ts: Defines supported UI languages and localized UI strings.
frontend/src/lib/kidsMode.ts: Provides kid-safe category filtering and checks for mature content.
frontend/src/lib/notifications.ts: Utilities for checking, requesting, and showing browser notifications.
frontend/src/lib/onboarding.ts: Tracks onboarding completion state in localStorage.
frontend/src/lib/profileValidation.ts: Validates usernames and profile images or URLs for profile updates.
frontend/src/lib/reminders.ts: Manages reminder settings, cooldown checks, and last-shown timestamps via localStorage.
frontend/src/lib/share.ts: Provides sharing utilities using Web Share API with clipboard fallbacks and helpers to share app or story URLs.
frontend/src/lib/storyLanguage.ts: Maps UI language to backend language and retrieves appropriate story content or translation availability.
frontend/src/lib/translatePlaceholder.ts: Generates placeholder translated story content by modifying English text with markers.
frontend/src/lib/userProfileStorage.ts: Manages guest profile persistence in localStorage with get, save, and clear helpers.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AboutUs.tsx: Renders an About Us page with introductory text about the app.
frontend/src/pages/CategoriesTab.tsx: Displays a grid of story categories with covers and navigation links.
frontend/src/pages/CategoryDetail.tsx: Shows stories within a selected category with loading states and mode toggle.
frontend/src/pages/FavoritesTab.tsx: Displays the user's favorited stories or an empty-state message.
frontend/src/pages/GoPremium.tsx: Shows premium subscription plans and enables marking the user as premium.
frontend/src/pages/HelpAndSupport.tsx: Presents help tips, contact info, and social links within a support layout.
frontend/src/pages/HomeTab.tsx: Home screen showing featured story, categories, ads, continue reading, and latest stories.
frontend/src/pages/PremiumSuccess.tsx: Displays a premium subscription success screen with benefits and navigation buttons.
frontend/src/pages/PrivacyPolicy.tsx: Renders the app’s privacy policy using a legal page layout.
frontend/src/pages/ProfileTab.tsx: Handles user profile viewing and editing, including username, avatar, sharing, and notification settings.
frontend/src/pages/SearchTab.tsx: Provides a searchable and sortable story list with filters and result display.
frontend/src/pages/StoryReader.tsx: Displays a story reader with language selection, favorites, downloads, auto-scroll, and customization options.
frontend/src/pages/TermsAndConditions.ts: Shows the app’s terms and conditions using a legal page layout.
frontend/src/pwa/registerServiceWorker.t: Registers the service worker and periodically checks for updates.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining dark mode, content paths, extended theme colors, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state file describing the app’s goals, architecture notes, existing features, and version metadata for the Global Tales Universe app.
